node.title: Reversing Diabetes & Other Chronic Diseases
node.description:
This presentation will show the profound impact a Christian Healthcare Provider who emphasizes Lifestyle Medicine or the Adventist Health Message has on not only physical health but mental, social and spiritual health as well. 
Objectives: 
Inspiring Healthcare Providers to embrace the Master’s method in providing true health and abundant life to all patients. Learn how to change healthcare outcomes in your local communities by focusing on the root causes of chronic disease and not merely treating the symptoms. The attendees will learn how to incorporate the Adventist Health Message in their medical / dental practices by using readily available resources such as Life and Health Ministry.
